# polytomic_mongodb_connection (Resource)

MongoDB Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_mongodb_connection" "mongodb" {
  name = "example"
  configuration = {
    hosts    = "mongodb.example.com"
    username = "user"
    database = "db"
  }
}
```
